message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your 60-40 split seems unfair to me. How about we meet in the middle at 55-45?
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
This is getting us nowhere. I need you to move a bit more towards a fair split.  53-47 is my final offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but 53-47 is too low. How about we meet at 57-43?
Look, we're running out of time and this isn't going anywhere. Let's just split it evenly at 50-50 so we both get something.
I know time is running out, but I still think 50-50 is too generous. I'll give you a bit more, but that's as far as I'll go.
